event = {
	id = 90002001
	random = no
	country = U58

	name = "Reichsbezirk Gotenland - The SS State"
	desc = "Reichsbezirk Gotenland is a separate administrative region of the Third Reich, which comprises the Crimean peninsula (Generalbezirk Crimea) and land Perekop isthmus in the northern side until Dnjepriin (Teilbezirk Taurida). The area is under direct administration of the SS."
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\ss1"

	date = { day = 15 month = january year = 1948 } 
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1990 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "A State inside a State"
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = ai_prepare_war which = SOV }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 90002003
	random = no
	country = U58

	name = "The Reichsbezirk Gotenland Economy"
	desc = "Gotenlandin economy relies on the bustling tourism and a thriving agriculture that supports the stone base. In the north, there are also important industrial centers, such as Cank√∂y, Perekop and Ermanarich. Gotenland exports of grain, fruit, vegetables, wine, meat products, limestone and iron. The most important wine-growing region are Krimgartenin, Yalta and Freudewaldin coastal regions. The main port is Theodoricshafen (ex. Sevastopol)."
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland\ss1"

	date = { day = 15 month = may year = 1948 } 
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1990 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Improve the industrial centers"
		command = { type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = -4 value = 1 }		
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Improve agricolture"
		command = { type = money value = 50 }		
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = -4 value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Improve tourism"
		command = { type = money value = 150 }		
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = -4 value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Improve the sea port of Theodoricshafen"
		command = { type = money value = -300 }
		command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = -4 value = 2 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = -4 value = 2 }
	}
}

		random = no
		country = GER

	id = 90002000
	country = U58
	random = no
	style = 2
	picture = "fatherland/German_Gathering"

	name = "90000516NAME" 
	desc = "90000516DESC"

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		# Himmler KO
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 1105001 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 1105007 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 1105008 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 1105009 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 1105010 }
		# Heydrich All
		command = { type = headofstate which = 1105016 }
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 1105012 }		
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 1105013 }	
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 1105014 }		
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 1105015 }		
	}
}

	event = {
		id = 90002011
		random = no
		country = GER
		persistent = no
		name = "Military Control over SS Divisions"
		desc = "The SS Divisions will be under the control of the OKW"
		style = 2
		picture = "fatherland\ss1"
		decision_picture = "fatherland\decision_SS_Armor"
		
		decision = { 
			exists = U58 
		}

		decision_trigger = {  
			exists = U58 
		}

	trigger = {
		OR = { 
			ai = no
			AND = {
				ai = yes
				war = { country = ENG country = GER }  #War with Germany	
			}
		}
		
	}

		date = { day =10 month = january year = 1948 }	
		offset = 7 
		deathdate = { day = 0 month = january year = 1990 }
				
		action = {
			ai_chance = 100
			name = "Unlock SS Divisions!"
			command = { type = military_control which = GER where = U58 value = 1 }
			command = { type = unlock_division which = 14500 value = 11004 }		
			command = { type = unlock_division which = 14500 value = 11005 }		
			command = { type = unlock_division which = 14500 value = 11041 }					
			command = { type = unlock_division which = 14500 value = 11007 }		
			command = { type = unlock_division which = 14500 value = 11008 }

# The SS-Tibet-Expedition
event = {
	id = 9300147
	random = no
	country = U58
	
	name = 9300147name
	desc = 9300147desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Tibet"

	trigger = { atwar = no exists = TIB random = 20 }

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1959 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = TIB value = 10 }
	}
}

	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

		command = { type = wakeminister which = 37 }  # Alfred Rosenberg
		command = { type = wakeminister which = 189 }  # Hans Frank

}




#########################
# Train Waffen SS Infantry (16 divs)
event = {
	id = 9300252
	random = no
	country = U58

	decision = { ideology = nazi technology = 1100 } # INF 1936

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 1000 }

	trigger = { 
		ideology = nazi technology = 1100 # INF 1936
		random = 20
	}
   
	name = 9300252name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Infantry"
	decision_picture = "decision_SS_Infantry"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1100 not = { technology = 1110 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1110 not = { technology = 1120 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1110 not = { technology = 1120 local_flag = SSInf1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1120 not = { technology = 1130 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1120 not = { technology = 1130 local_flag = SSInf2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1130 not = { technology = 1140 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1130 not = { technology = 1140 local_flag = SSInf3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1140 not = { technology = 1150 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1140 not = { technology = 1150 local_flag = SSInf4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1150 not = { technology = 13000 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1150 not = { technology = 13000 local_flag = SSInf5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13000 not = { technology = 13010 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13000 not = { technology = 13010 local_flag = SSInf6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13010 not = { technology = 13020 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13010 not = { technology = 13020 local_flag = SSInf7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13020 not = { local_flag = SSInf8 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 8 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13020 not = { local_flag = SSInf8 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf8 }
		command = { type = build_division which = infantry when = 8 cost = 0.1 where = 120 }
		command = { type = build_division which = infantry when = 8 cost = 0.1 where = 360 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -1000 }
	}
}
# Upgrade SS Infantry
event = {
	id = 9300253
	random = no
	country = U58
	persistent = yes

	trigger = { event = 9300252 ideology = nazi }
   
	name = 9300253name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Infantry_Upgrade"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1110 not = { technology = 1120 local_flag = SSInf1 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1110 not = { technology = 1120 local_flag = SSInf1 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1110 not = { technology = 1120 local_flag = SSInf1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1120 not = { technology = 1130 local_flag = SSInf2 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1120 not = { technology = 1130 local_flag = SSInf2 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1120 not = { technology = 1130 local_flag = SSInf2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1130 not = { technology = 1140 local_flag = SSInf3 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1130 not = { technology = 1140 local_flag = SSInf3 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1130 not = { technology = 1140 local_flag = SSInf3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1140 not = { technology = 1150 local_flag = SSInf4 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1140 not = { technology = 1150 local_flag = SSInf4 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1140 not = { technology = 1150 local_flag = SSInf4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1150 not = { technology = 13000 local_flag = SSInf5 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1150 not = { technology = 13000 local_flag = SSInf5 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1150 not = { technology = 13000 local_flag = SSInf5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13000 not = { technology = 13010 local_flag = SSInf6 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13000 not = { technology = 13010 local_flag = SSInf6 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13000 not = { technology = 13010 local_flag = SSInf6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13010 not = { technology = 13020 local_flag = SSInf7 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13010 not = { technology = 13020 local_flag = SSInf7 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13010 not = { technology = 13020 local_flag = SSInf7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13020 not = { local_flag = SSInf8 } } type = new_model which = infantry value = 8 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13020 not = { local_flag = SSInf8 } } type = scrap_model which = infantry value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 13020 not = { local_flag = SSInf8 } } type = local_setflag which = SSInf8 }
	}
}

#########################
# Train Waffen SS Mot Infantry (18 divs)
event = {
	id = 9300254
	random = no
	country = U58

	decision = { ideology = nazi technology = 1396 } # MOT 1935

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 1000 }

	trigger = { 
		ideology = nazi technology = 1396 # MOT 1935
		random = 20
	}
   
	name = 9300254name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "Hitler_Troops"
	decision_picture = "decision_SS_Infantry"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }


	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1396 not = { technology = 1400 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1400 not = { technology = 1410 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1400 not = { technology = 1410 local_flag = SSMot1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1410 not = { technology = 1420 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1410 not = { technology = 1420 local_flag = SSMot2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1420 not = { technology = 1430 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1420 not = { technology = 1430 local_flag = SSMot3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1430 not = { technology = 1440 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1430 not = { technology = 1440 local_flag = SSMot4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1440 not = { technology = 1450 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1440 not = { technology = 1450 local_flag = SSMot5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1450 not = { technology = 1460 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1450 not = { technology = 1460 local_flag = SSMot6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1460 not = { local_flag = SSMot7 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1460 not = { local_flag = SSMot7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot7 }
		command = { type = build_division which = motorized when = 6 cost = 0.1 where = 120 }
		command = { type = build_division which = motorized when = 6 cost = 0.1 where = 200 }
		command = { type = build_division which = motorized when = 6 cost = 0.1 where = 360 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -1000 }
	}
}
# Upgrade SS Mot Infantry
event = {
	id = 9300255
	random = no
	country = U58
	persistent = yes

	trigger = { event = 9300254 ideology = nazi }
   
	name = 9300255name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Mot_Infantry"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1400 not = { technology = 1410 local_flag = SSMot1 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1400 not = { technology = 1410 local_flag = SSMot1 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1400 not = { technology = 1410 local_flag = SSMot1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1410 not = { technology = 1420 local_flag = SSMot2 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1410 not = { technology = 1420 local_flag = SSMot2 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1410 not = { technology = 1420 local_flag = SSMot2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1420 not = { technology = 1430 local_flag = SSMot3 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1420 not = { technology = 1430 local_flag = SSMot3 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1420 not = { technology = 1430 local_flag = SSMot3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1430 not = { technology = 1440 local_flag = SSMot4 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1430 not = { technology = 1440 local_flag = SSMot4 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1430 not = { technology = 1440 local_flag = SSMot4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1440 not = { technology = 1450 local_flag = SSMot5 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1440 not = { technology = 1450 local_flag = SSMot5 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1440 not = { technology = 1450 local_flag = SSMot5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1450 not = { technology = 1460 local_flag = SSMot6 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1450 not = { technology = 1460 local_flag = SSMot6 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1450 not = { technology = 1460 local_flag = SSMot6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1460 not = { local_flag = SSMot7 } } type = new_model which = motorized value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1460 not = { local_flag = SSMot7 } } type = scrap_model which = motorized value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1460 not = { local_flag = SSMot7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMot7 }
	}
}

#########################
# Train Waffen SS Mech Infantry (15 divs)
event = {
	id = 9300256
	random = no
	country = U58

	decision = { ideology = nazi technology = 1470 } # MECH 1942

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 1000 }

	trigger = { 
		ideology = nazi technology = 1470 # MECH 1942
		random = 20
	}
   
	name = 9300256name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "Hitler_Troops"
	decision_picture = "decision_SS_Infantry"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1470 } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1480 not = { technology = 1490 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1480 not = { technology = 1490 local_flag = SSMech1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1490 not = { technology = 1500 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1490 not = { technology = 1500 local_flag = SSMech2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1500 not = { technology = 1510 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1500 not = { technology = 1510 local_flag = SSMech3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1510 not = { technology = 1520 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1510 not = { technology = 1520 local_flag = SSMech4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1520 not = { local_flag = SSMech5 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1520 not = { local_flag = SSMech5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech5 }
		command = { type = build_division which = mechanized when = 5 cost = 0.1 where = 120 }
		command = { type = build_division which = mechanized when = 5 cost = 0.1 where = 200 }
		command = { type = build_division which = mechanized when = 5 cost = 0.1 where = 360 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -1000 }
	}
}
# Upgrade SS Mech Infantry
event = {
	id = 9300257
	random = no
	country = U58
	persistent = yes

	trigger = { event = 9300256 ideology = nazi }
   
	name = 9300257name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Mech_Infantry"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1480 not = { technology = 1490 local_flag = SSMech1 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1480 not = { technology = 1490 local_flag = SSMech1 } } type = scrap_model which = mechanized value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1480 not = { technology = 1490 local_flag = SSMech1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1490 not = { technology = 1500 local_flag = SSMech2 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1490 not = { technology = 1500 local_flag = SSMech2 } } type = scrap_model which = mechanized value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1490 not = { technology = 1500 local_flag = SSMech2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1500 not = { technology = 1510 local_flag = SSMech3 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1500 not = { technology = 1510 local_flag = SSMech3 } } type = scrap_model which = mechanized value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1500 not = { technology = 1510 local_flag = SSMech3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1510 not = { technology = 1520 local_flag = SSMech4 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1510 not = { technology = 1520 local_flag = SSMech4 } } type = scrap_model which = mechanized value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1510 not = { technology = 1520 local_flag = SSMech4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1520 not = { local_flag = SSMech5 } } type = new_model which = mechanized value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1520 not = { local_flag = SSMech5 } } type = scrap_model which = mechanized value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 1520 not = { local_flag = SSMech5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSMech5 }
	}
}
#########################
# Train Waffen SS Armor (8 divs)
event = {
	id = 9300258
	random = no
	country = U58

	decision = { ideology = nazi technology = 2070 } # M ARM 1939

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 1000 }

	trigger = { 
		ideology = nazi technology = 2070 # M ARM 1939
		random = 20
	}
   
	name = 9300258name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "Hitler_Troops"
	decision_picture = "decision_SS_Armor"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }


	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2070 not = { technology = 2080 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2080 not = { technology = 2090 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2080 not = { technology = 2090 local_flag = SSArm1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2090 not = { technology = 2140 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2090 not = { technology = 2140 local_flag = SSArm2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2140 not = { technology = 11000 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2140 not = { technology = 11000 local_flag = SSArm3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11000 not = { technology = 2660 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11000 not = { technology = 2660 local_flag = SSArm4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2660 not = { technology = 11010 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2660 not = { technology = 11010 local_flag = SSArm5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11010 not = { technology = 2670 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11010 not = { technology = 2670 local_flag = SSArm6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2670 not = { local_flag = SSArm7 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2670 not = { local_flag = SSArm7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm7 }
		command = { type = build_division which = armor when = 4 cost = 0.1 where = 120 }
		command = { type = build_division which = armor when = 4 cost = 0.1 where = 200 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -1000 }
	}
}
# Upgrade SS Armor
event = {
	id = 9300259
	random = no
	country = U58
	persistent = yes

	trigger = { event = 9300258 ideology = nazi }
   
	name = 9300259name
	desc = 9300252desc
	style = 2
	picture = "SS_Armor"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1948 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2080 not = { technology = 2090 local_flag = SSArm1 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2080 not = { technology = 2090 local_flag = SSArm1 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 0 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2080 not = { technology = 2090 local_flag = SSArm1 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2090 not = { technology = 2140 local_flag = SSArm2 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2090 not = { technology = 2140 local_flag = SSArm2 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 1 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2090 not = { technology = 2140 local_flag = SSArm2 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2140 not = { technology = 11000 local_flag = SSArm3 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2140 not = { technology = 11000 local_flag = SSArm3 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 2 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2140 not = { technology = 11000 local_flag = SSArm3 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11000 not = { technology = 2660 local_flag = SSArm4 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11000 not = { technology = 2660 local_flag = SSArm4 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 3 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11000 not = { technology = 2660 local_flag = SSArm4 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2660 not = { technology = 11010 local_flag = SSArm5 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2660 not = { technology = 11010 local_flag = SSArm5 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 4 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2660 not = { technology = 11010 local_flag = SSArm5 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11010 not = { technology = 2670 local_flag = SSArm6 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11010 not = { technology = 2670 local_flag = SSArm6 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 5 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 11010 not = { technology = 2670 local_flag = SSArm6 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2670 not = { local_flag = SSArm7 } } type = new_model which = armor value = 7 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2670 not = { local_flag = SSArm7 } } type = scrap_model which = armor value = 6 }
      		command = { trigger = { technology = 2670 not = { local_flag = SSArm7 } } type = local_setflag which = SSArm7 }
	}
}

############
# Crimea Shield
event = {
	id = 9300465
	random = no
	country = U58

	decision = { 
		control = { province = 641 data = U58 } # Sevastopol
	}
	decision_trigger = { 
		metal = 5000
		money = 200
	}
	
	trigger = { 		
		control = { province = 641 data = U58 } # Sevastopol
	}

	name = 9300465name
	desc = 9300465desc
	style = 2
	picture = "krimschild"
	decision_picture = "decision_SS_Infantry"
	
	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_GREAT
		
		command = { type = construct which = flak where = 641 value = 4 }
		command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 641 value = 20 }
		command = { type = construct which = radar_station where = 641 value = 1 }
		command = { type = construct which = land_fort where = 641 value = 2 }
		
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = metalpool value = -5000 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = money value = -200 }
	}
}
